function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of large image datasets may lead to privacy concerns and potential misuse of data.","Impact":"Violation of privacy rights and potential exploitation of individuals in surveillance footage.","Mitigation":"Anonymization and blurring of sensitive information in the surveillance footage, and obtaining consent for data use.","Technologies":"Anonymization tools, consent management systems.","People":"Individuals captured in surveillance footage.","Owner":"Surveillance system operators and data controllers."},{"Description":"Social media event analysis may lead to the spread of misinformation and panic in the population.","Impact":"Dissemination of false information and unnecessary public concern, affecting social behavior and public health.","Mitigation":"Verification of information sources, fact-checking, and transparent communication of findings.","Technologies":"Information verification tools, fact-checking algorithms.","People":"General public accessing the social media event analysis.","Owner":"Researchers and organizations conducting the social media event analysis."},{"Description":"Mass video surveillance may lead to concerns regarding the centralized collection and storage of sensitive data.","Impact":"Potential data breaches, unauthorized access, and misuse of surveillance data, leading to privacy violations and security risks.","Mitigation":"Implement data encryption, access control mechanisms, and regular security audits of the surveillance data storage.","Technologies":"Data encryption tools, access control systems, security audit tools.","People":"Individuals whose data is captured in the surveillance footage.","Owner":"Organizations and entities responsible for the video surveillance infrastructure."}]}
